text: These chariots were a parody of those used by Nagash's opponents, cnstructed from bone and sinew, and held together by the power of Dark Magic.

It is said that the warriors of the land that is now known as the Kingdom of the Dead rode into battle in mighty chariots, cunningly constructed to be incredible light and strong. It is therefore no suprise that when Nagash rose up and overran that once proud land countless Undead chariots were at the forefront of his army.
